     <h1>
      It looks like you have JavaScript disabled!

  <div class="banner ui center aligned icon header" id="top-header">
   <img alt="USB Stick" class="icon" src="/img/usb_stick.png"/>
   <h2>
    USB-Dongle Authentication
   </h2>
   <div class="sub header">
    List of websites and whether or not they support
    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Initiative_For_Open_Authentication">
     One Time Passwords (OTP)
    </a>
    or
    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebAuthn">
     Web Authentication (WebAuthn)
    </a>
    respectively
      FIDO2,
    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universal_2nd_Factor">
     U2F
    </a>
    .
   </div>
   <div class="sub header">
    Also see the list of
    <a href="/dongles/">
     dongles
    </a>
    and the protocol they support.
   </div>
   <div class="sub header" id="">
    Add your own favorite site by submitting a pull request on the
    <a href="https://github.com/Nitrokey/dongleauth">
     GitHub repo
    </a>
    .
   </div>
   <div class="sub header" id="search-wrapper">
    <label for="jets-search">
     <i class="search icon">
     </i>
    </label>
    <input autocomplete="off" id="jets-search" placeholder="Search websites" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" type="search"/>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="ui stackable grid container">
   <div class="five column row">

    <div class="website-table desktop-table backup-table" id="backup-desktoptable">
     <table class="ui celled table content-wrapper">
      <thead>
       <tr>
        <th class="single line four wide">
         <h3>
          Backup and Sync
         </h3>
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         Docs
        </th>
        <!--
      <th class="two wide">SMS</th>
      <th class="two wide">Phone Call</th>
      <th class="two wide">Email</th>
      <th class="two wide">Hardware Token</th>
      <th class="two wide">Software Token</th>
      -->
        <th class="two wide">
         One Time Passwords (OTP)
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         WebAuthn, FIDO2, U2F
        </th>
       </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody class="jets-content">
       <tr class="desktop-tr">
        <td class="main negative">
         <div class="title">
          <div class="keywords" style="display:none;">
           Apple iCloud https://www.icloud.com
          </div>
          <noscript>

          <span class="popup exception" data-html="&lt;div class='header'&gt;    Exceptions &amp; Restrictions&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class='content'&gt;            Hardware token supporting FIDO2/WebAuthn can only be used in Windows 10 version 1809 and above using Edge browser.    &lt;/div&gt;" data-position="bottom center">
           <i class="warning sign red link icon">
           </i>
          </span>
         </div>
        </td>
        <td class="positive icon">
         <a href="https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12408/">
          <i class="book link large icon">
          </i>
         </a>
        </td>

        <a class="name" href="https://gitlab.com">

        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="methods">
        <p>
         <i class="checkmark small icon" title="OTP">
         </i>
         One Time Passwords (OTP)
        </p>
        <p>
         <i class="checkmark small icon" title="U2F">
         </i>

         </i>

     <div class="label">

     <div class="jets-content">

          <noscript>
           <img alt="Read the Docs" class="icon" src="/img/developer/readthedocs.png"/>
          </noscript>
          <img alt="Read the Docs" class="icon" data-src="/img/developer/readthedocs.png" src="/img/placeholder.png"/>
          <a class="name" href="https://readthedocs.org">
           Read the Docs
          </a>
         </div>

           <i class="star icon">

           In Progress!
          </a>
         </div>

     <table class="ui celled table content-wrapper">
      <thead>
       <tr>
        <th class="single line four wide">
         <h3>
          Education
         </h3>
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         Docs
        </th>
        <!--
      <th class="two wide">SMS</th>
      <th class="two wide">Phone Call</th>
      <th class="two wide">Email</th>
      <th class="two wide">Hardware Token</th>
      <th class="two wide">Software Token</th>
      -->
        <th class="two wide">
         One Time Passwords (OTP)
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         WebAuthn, FIDO2, U2F
        </th>
       </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody class="jets-content">
       <tr class="desktop-tr">
        <td class="main negative">
         <div class="title">
          <div class="keywords" style="display:none;">
           (ISC)2 https://www.isc2.org
          </div>
          <noscript>
           <img alt="(ISC)2" class="icon" src="/img/education/isc2.png"/>

   <div class="five column row">
    <div class="category column" id="entertainment">
     <h5 class="ui icon header">
      <i class="circular play icon">
      </i>
      <small>
       Entertainment
      </small>
     </h5>
    </div>
    <div class="website-table mobile-table entertainment-table" id="entertainment-mobiletable">
     <div class="label">
      <h3>
       Entertainment
      </h3>
     </div>
     <div class="jets-content">
      <div class="main negative">
       <div class="title">
        <div class="keywords" style="display:none;">
         Bandcamp https://bandcamp.com
        </div>
        <noscript>
         <img alt="Bandcamp" class="icon" src="/img/entertainment/bandcamp.png"/>
        </noscript>
        <img alt="Bandcamp" class="icon" data-src="/img/entertainment/bandcamp.png" src="/img/placeholder.png"/>
        <a class="name" href="https://bandcamp.com">
         Bandcamp
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="methods">
        <p>
         <i class="ban small icon" title="None">
         </i>
         Dongles not supported
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-group">
        <a class="ui twitter mini button" href="https://twitter.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdongleauth.info&amp;text=Security+is+important%2C+%40Bandcamp.+We%27d+like+it+if+you+supported+auth+with+USB+dongles.&amp;hashtags=SupportDongleAuth" target="_blank">
         <i class="twitter icon">
         </i>
        </a>
        <a class="ui facebook mini button" href="https://facebook.com/Bandcamp/" target="_blank">
         <i class="facebook icon">

    <div class="website-table desktop-table entertainment-table" id="entertainment-desktoptable">
     <table class="ui celled table content-wrapper">
      <thead>
       <tr>
        <th class="single line four wide">
         <h3>
          Entertainment
         </h3>
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         Docs
        </th>
        <!--
      <th class="two wide">SMS</th>
      <th class="two wide">Phone Call</th>
      <th class="two wide">Email</th>
      <th class="two wide">Hardware Token</th>
      <th class="two wide">Software Token</th>
      -->
        <th class="two wide">
         One Time Passwords (OTP)
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">
         WebAuthn, FIDO2, U2F
        </th>
       </tr>
      </thead>

          </a>

           <i class="warning sign red link icon">

       </tr>

      <th class="two wide">Software Token</th>

        <th class="two wide">
         One Time Passwords (OTP)
        </th>
        <th class="two wide">

        </th>
       </tr>

        <td class="positive icon">

        <td class="positive icon">
         <i class="checkmark large icon" title="Universal 2nd Factor (U2F)">
         </i>
        </td>
       </tr>

         <img alt="Parsec" class="icon" src="/img/remote/parsec.png"/>
        </noscript>
        <img alt="Parsec" class="icon" data-src="/img/remote/parsec.png" src="/img/placeholder.png"/>
        <a class="name" href="https://www.parsecgaming.com">
         Parsec
        </a>
        <a href="https://twitter.com/ParsecTeam/status/957465838076026880" target="_blank">
         <i class="external url link large icon">
         </i>
        </a>
       </div>
       <p>
        IN PROGRESS!
       </p>
       <div>
        <a class="ui twitter mini button" href="https://twitter.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdongleauth.info&amp;text=Thanks+for+working+on+support+for+USB+dongle+auth%2C+%40ParsecTeam%21&amp;hashtags=SupportDongleAuth" target="_blank">
         <i class="twitter icon">
         </i>
         THANK THEM
        </a>

   <div class="five column row">
    <div class="category column" id="security">
     <h5 class="ui icon header">
      <i class="circular unlock icon">
      </i>
      <small>
       Security
      </small>
     </h5>
    </div>
    <div class="website-table mobile-table security-table" id="security-mobiletable">
     <div class="label">
      <h3>
       Security
      </h3>
     </div>
     <div class="jets-content">
      <div class="main negative">
       <div class="title">
        <div class="keywords" style="display:none;">
         AdGuard https://adguard.com
        </div>
        <noscript>
         <img alt="AdGuard" class="icon" src="/img/security/adguard.png"/>

         AdGuard

       </div>
       <div class="methods">
        <p>
         <i class="ban small icon" title="None">

       </div>
       <div class="button-group">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="main negative">
       <div class="title">
        <div class="keywords" style="display:none;">

        <noscript>
